ygData.subject: Ring of the Dead [possible spoiler]
ygData.msgSnippet: In my futile attempts to get the Ring of the Dead, I have done the fire beetle eye quest 3 or 4 times, the paladin quest, and turned in the Thex Mallet.  I now
ygData.messageBody:
In my futile attempts to get the Ring of the Dead, I have done the
fire beetle eye quest 3 or 4 times, the paladin quest, and turned in
the Thex Mallet. I now am working on the Kerran Beetle eye and Bull
Elephant Tusk quest, hoping that it will give me the ring. The woman
already offers to recharge it, but I cannot find where to get it.

This weekend I managed to obtain the tusk dropped by Cracked Tusk.
The actual item is a gigantic chipped tusk. By the words of the quest
he says to bring the beetle eyes, but before I do that, bring him
the tusk of a bull elephant. Now I have killed many bull elephants,
and all I ever get is a small mammoth tusk. So I figured that this
named elephant might be the key.

I've waited in S Karanas now for weeks searching for Cracked Tusk
and auctioning enough to drive anyone mad, when finally I got an
offer to buy it for 20pp. Ouch. I bit the bullet, bought the tusk
and ran back to Neriak.

I turned in the gigantic chipped tusk without the beetle eyes
(I was supposed to turn it in first), and got a worthless junk message.

What I would like to do, is compile a list of failed attempts (I
assume anyone successful is keeping it to themselves) of doing this
quest. Please include exactly what you have turned in.

So far:

Failed:
1 small mammoth tusk
1 box of beetle eyes

Failed:
1 small mammoth tusk

Failed:
1 box of beetle eyes

Failed:
1 gigantic chipped tusk

Also, is this quest just broken and I'm wasting my time?

Thanks,

Xilith T'Vyn
Tunare
